isis.stitle: International® DT 466E, DT 466, 530, 530E, and HT 530 Diesel Engines - Vibration Damper, Crankshaft, Main Bearings, Flywheel, and Crankcase - Remove - Remove Flywheel Housing

warning.para: To prevent personal injury or possible death, due to heavy weight and limited access, get assistance to remove or install the flywheel housing, especially when working in chassis.

caution.para: To avoid engine damage, for vehicles equipped with MT-654CR transmission, a transmission adapter ring is bolted to transmission side of flywheel housing. It is not necessary to remove adapter ring from flywheel housing. This is a special flywheel housing with adapter ring bolted in place to match with flywheel housing as it was machined.

note.para: Only remove flywheel housing if required.

step1.para: Remove eight flywheel housing mounting bolts from crankcase.
